main.bio: Floridian transplant in Texas, I am a water sports and all things outdoors enthusiast. Coding is a hobby and my job so please reach out if you are looking to collaborate on an idea!
main.contactmessage: If you would like to chat you can reach me below

resume.skillmessage: While I mainly use Spring-Boot, Angular, and SQL at my current job; I like to explore other technologies.

education.degree: Bachelors in Computer Science, minor in General Business

work.title: Software Engineer Developer, Executive Reporting
work.description: Frontend development of a business intelligence tool giving transparency to executives at Fidelity. The team utilizes Domo and interfaces with data engineers to pipe relevant data into a querable data lake

work.title: Software Engineer Developer, Investment Operations
work.description: Full stack development of cloud ready applications utilizing Spring-Boot, Angular, and SQL centered around the net asset value, pricing, and accounting of all Fidelity funds.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: 17 week training program where I was taught and assessed on various programming and software engineering principles to smooth the transition from college to full time software engineer.
